segments.text: We're having a sixties party next week . Do you want to come ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You come dressed in anything from the sixties .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like fun . But where can I get clothes that old ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Check out your mom's closet . I'll bet she still has something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . Can I bring some music from that period too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be great ! Do you have LPs or Cds ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't tell me you have a record player !
segments.speaker: S2
